ğŸŒ Where Did the Word “Kubernetes” Come From? The word Kubernetes (pronounced koo-ber-net-ees) comes from the Greek, meaning helmsman or pilot of a ship â›µ. Fitting, since it’s all about steering your containers through cloud seas!
